text: aur jab samandar mein kabhee tum ko koee takaleeph pahunche to jinakee tum ibaadat kiya karate the gaayab ho gae magar bas vahee (ek khuda yaad rahata hai) us par bhee jab khuda ne tum ko chhutakaara dekar khushakee tak pahuncha diya to phir tum isase munh mod baithen aur insaan bada hee naashukra hai
